name: Perfume Stockpile
description: This is a Warehouse website. You can stock your product on this website You can manage your product on the My Items page. On the home page, you can see only 6 items. On the inventory page, you can see all items. You can delete or update your stock on this site. If you deliverd your product the quantity will decrease.
technology: REACT, TAILWIND, DAISY UI, FIREBASE, AXIOS, REACT-TOASTIFY, DOTENV, MONGO DB, EXPRESS JS, NODE JS, FIREBASE-HOOK

name: Mars Technology
description: This is a Manufacturer Website. Anyone can order product for their buisness. In dashboard user can see all order and add a riview.User and admin can update profile. There is some admin specific route like 'Make admin' and 'Manage all order'.
technology: REACT, TAILWIND, DAISY UI, FIREBASE, AXIOS, REACT-QUERY, REACT-TOASTIFY, DOTENV, MONGO DB, EXPRESS JS, NODE JS, FIREBASE-HOOK

name: Sindid's Photography
server: This is a Photography website. A website for a indivitual photgrapher. He shoot photo for different kinds of events. His packages list are given on the website.
